name: BRB w/ fan 01
description:
conceptual, web, narf, documentation, netart, webcam, capture, twigwam, video

Screen captures from publicly streamed Webcams circa 2008-2012,
*all pieces minted as captured save for occasional speed tweak.

Appropriating early Internet live-streaming social networks
--the stressed bandwidth of the time along with early webcam technology
afforded a particular kind of pixeled, glitchy abstraction.
This living layer of network expression help evoke these
digital portals into the early millennial domestic space
The idea of presence itself and the intention of presence is considered ​
BRB, internet slang for "Be Right Back", was often used in the chat
and mirrors this expectation of virtual presence.
​
hb
